Tailor Server API¶

Tailor Command JSON¶

{
    "hosts": [
        "server1.example.com"
    ],
    "commands": [
        {
            "command": "make_release",
            "params": [
                {
                    "name": "tag",
                    "value": "1.0"
                },
                {
                    "name": "message",
                    "value": "a new tag"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "command": "alpha",
            "params": []
        }
    ],
    "api_key": "sdfsdlkoweiu209823f4980fsadnfBQAMCk3I",
    "schema_url": "http://localhost:8001/tailor/api/v1/schema/"
}
